resources.string: "This is a very simple quiz, to test your knowledge about the series The Expanse! Don't forget to anwser all questions and then get a grade! Okay lets start :) !"
"1. Lets start with an easy one: What is your name?"
"2. What is the main factions name?"
"4. What was the Rocinante real name?"
"5. What was the nem who became the seed crystal?"
